Package com.djrapitops.plan.version

Class SpongeVersionChecker

java.lang.Object
com.djrapitops.plan.version.VersionChecker
com.djrapitops.plan.version.SpongeVersionChecker
All Implemented Interfaces:
SubSystem
@Singleton public class SpongeVersionChecker extends VersionChecker
System for checking if new Version is available when the System initializes, using the Ore API.
